content: the k4 project includes deck the halls designs and many other patterns from my original knit clothing brand label knitty kitty knitty kitty designs expanded to crochet patterns and became knitty kitty knotty kat hence k4 it is now an organization where part of the profits from my pattern sales go to help animal welfare and find forever homes for our furry friends 😀 thank you for contributing to this cause by purchasing this pattern information if you have any questions comments or suggestions please email thek4project@gmail com to share your project instagram @thek4project or post your project on etsy or ravelry for help and tutorials go to our youtube channel thek4project thek4project etsy com 3
